description:
When using a qacow2 to create a vm with rbd imagebackend,  the vm can be successfully created. 
Although vm's state is active, vm's console show that it can find boot disk.
From ceph's docs, we find that Ceph only works with raw volumes, so we need to add an verify to 
check whehter the image format is raw when creating vm.
title: Make sure image format is raw when using rbd as imagebackend
